channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Quarter of Your Retirement Fund Just Isn't Keeping Up
item.description: International stocks keep lagging behind U.S. companies, yet they make up nearly a quarter of target-date funds on average.

item.title: Asian Investment-Grade Bonds Likely to Attract Strong Demand at Low-5% Yields, UBS Says
item.description: Asian investment-grade bonds are likely to attract strong demand at low-5% yields, UBS’s Chief Investment Office said.

item.title: Yomiuri Newspaper to Introduce New Stock Index as Alternative to Nikkei and Topix
item.description: Japan’s largest newspaper by print circulation plans to introduce a new stock index next March that it sees as an alternative to the widely followed N...

item.title: Kohl’s has a new CEO, but not enough of the things its shoppers depend on
item.description: When Kohl’s Corp. on Monday announced it was getting a new chief executive next year, investors got suspicious. On Tuesday, the department-store chain...

item.title: New Zealand Shares Fall 1.2% From Three-Year High
item.description: New Zealand’s NZX-50 closed 1.2% lower at 13053.56, pulling back from a three-year high on broad-based losses.

item.title: Singapore Dollar Weakens Slightly Amid U.S.-Holiday-Thinned Trading
item.description: The Singapore dollar weakened slightly against its U.S. counterpart in somewhat thin trading amid the U.S. Thanksgiving holiday.

item.title: This could be one of the biggest box-office weekends since ‘Barbenheimer.’ Why? ‘MoGlicked.’
item.description: Movie fans are expected to flock to ‘Wicked,’ ‘Gladiator II’ and ‘Moana 2’ this weekend

item.title: Billionaire Larry Ellison helped give a high school student $10 million to play football for Michigan — and gave us a glimpse behind the NIL curtain

item.title: FTC’s latest case against Microsoft represents Lina Khan’s last swing against Big Tech
item.description: The move by Khan, who has less than two months remaining in office before the Trump administration takes over, is one last attempt to rein in Big Tech...
